casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Fernando Scott JACKSON. No. 85P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of February 2007 by Defendant for Appointment of Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
